key.name: group-source-destination
key.description: An array of groups, source folders and destination folders. Each element of the array contains the group, a list of source folders and a destination folder: ['group1;source1|source2|...|sourcen;destination1','group2;source1|source2|...|sourcen;destination2',...]

key.name: enabled-groups
key.description: Contains the groups enabled to make a synchronization

key.name: last-errors
key.description: Last errors of the last synchronization. If empty, no errors
